title: Full-width entry text with repositioned edit/delete buttons

requirements.summary: Make the journal entry text display full width in EntryCard.tsx by removing width constraints that cause it to share horizontal space with edit/delete buttons
acceptanceCriteria: The entry text area spans the full width of the card container
No horizontal space is shared between the entry text and the action buttons

file_operations.description: Remove any flex layout or width constraints that cause the entry text to share horizontal space with the edit/delete buttons. Ensure the text container uses full width (w-full) and is not constrained by flex row layout with action buttons.

requirements.summary: Reposition edit and delete buttons below the entry text in a dedicated row or compact toolbar at the bottom of the card
acceptanceCriteria: Edit and delete buttons are visually separated from the entry text (below or in a footer row of the card)
Both buttons remain clearly visible and tappable
The layout looks correct in both light and dark themes

file_operations.description: Move the edit and delete button group from its current inline position to a separate row below the entry text. Place buttons in a flex container with appropriate spacing and alignment. Ensure buttons maintain proper styling, hover states, and visibility in both light and dark themes using existing Tailwind theme classes.
